rules.description: (ON WINDOWS) Change caps_lock to ctrl when used as modifier, escape when used alone
A and right shift to Control
(ON MAC) Change caps_lock to cmd when used as modifier, escape when used alone
(MAC) Change (knapp höger om å) till curly brackets
(WINDOWS) Change (knapp höger om å) till curly brackets
cmd+shift+g in paralells to open chrome alfred shortcut
send ctrl+space (accept and execute suggestion) in iterm
Map Cmd+R to Ctrl+b followed by o in  (tmux switch panes)
vscode toggle windows (OBS! also requires you to set workbench.action.show(Next+Previous)WindowTab) in vscode
Switch command and option FOR NON MAC KEYBOARDS
firefox tabs list (use vimium keybinding instead: `map <m-e> Vomnibar.activateTabSelection`)
